name: workway
description: A general purpose, Web Worker driven, remote namespace with classes and methods.

scripts.build: npm run remoted:cjs && npm run remoted:esm && npm run bundle && npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm test && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = workway;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default workway;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.remoted:cjs: cp remoted.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = remoted;' >> cjs/remoted.js
scripts.remoted:esm: cp remoted.js esm/ && echo 'export default remoted;' >> esm/remoted.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && rm -f min.js.br
scripts.test: cd test && node index.js && echo $(tput bold)OK$(tput sgr0)

author: Andrea Giammarchi
